products.description:
Sleek, compact cabinets fit close to the wall and blend in under eaves for a neat, low-profile appearance
Articulated Array® speaker design provides large, consistent soundfield with three 2-1/2" full-range environmental drivers in each speaker
Complements other speakers in the Bose environmental speaker family; mix and match outdoor speakers for extensive sound coverage

products.description:
Bose Stereo Everywhere® performance means you hear rich stereo sound almost anywhere in the room, rather than only at the one "sweet spot" produced by conventional speakers
Versatile speakers offer high performance for stereo or surround applications in both home theater and music applications
